 संस्कृत शब्दसूची   
  
  
The long list presented on the next page onwards was processed from  
Mahabharata and Ramayana files as encoded by Professor Tokunaga.  
  
The words are carefully arranged based on sanskrit/devanagari alphabets  
and can be split-up into a file per alphabet.  
  
The transliteration scheme used is that of ITRANS for its `phonetic' style.  
  
There are many vibhaktIs present which will either need reduction to  
basic word or expansion with missing vibhaktIs.  Some of the words are  
incorrect which are carried-over from the original transliteration.  
A good amount of proofreading may be needed.  
  
For other sanskrit/devanagari related documents please see web pages on  
https://sanskritdocuments.org  
  
Please do not copy the file to promote your own website as we find mis-users  
frequently.  Promote Sanskrit learning and literature study.  
  
Please send your questions and comments to sanskrit@cheerful.com
